title: Greggs giving away 200,000 FREE bakes - but you have to be quick
text:
Greggs has revealed it will be giving away a staggering 200,000 free bakes to its most loyal customers.

The popular British bakery chain, famous for its sausage rolls and vegetable pasties, made the announcement this week.

Customers using their app will find out by midnight on Thursday whether they are entitled to the free spicy chicken and pepperoni or cheese and onion bakes on offer.

The reward voucher will appear on a number of lucky customers' accounts, and they will have until the end of October to redeem it.

You knead this deal! Greggs has revealed it will be giving away a staggering 200,000 free bakes to its most loyal customers

The offer only applies to those who have the Greggs Rewards App, and they will be assessed on their activity in recent weeks.

Those proven to be the most avid baked good fans will be rewarded - but only if they've remembered to scan their recent purchases onto their account.

Lucky customers will be given a unique QR code which they can scan at the till, before choosing their bake.

Customers using their app will find out by midnight on Thursday whether they are entitled to the free spicy chicken and pepperoni and cheese and onion bakes on offer. Pictured: A chicken bake

This follows news that the bakery will open its doors to customers for longer hours, as Christmas approaches.

The retailer, which was founded as a Tyneside bakery in 1939, now has over 2,000 branches and is famous for its festive and eclectic window displays.

They first launched an animated window display in 1971, and have since wowed the locals with a wide range of themes including Peter Pan, Alice in Wonderland and Paddington Bear.
description: British bakery chain Greggs has revealed it will be giving away a staggering 200,000 free bakes to its most loyal customers.
